jobDescription: At San Jose Behavioral Health, our counseling professionals provide treatment and support to assist clients in their recovery from behavioral problems and assist with modifying problem behaviors; may also provide counseling services to families of clients. Summary: San Jose Behavioral Health is currently seeking a PMHNP (Psychiatric Mental Health Nurse Practitioner). The PMHNP will conduct patient assessments and provide medical interventions, while maintaining a safe and efficient working and treatment environment. The PMHNP will work directly with the treatment team to ensure safe, quality patient care is provided, and will complete daily duties as assigned by the Medical Director. Requirements/Qualifications: Graduate from an accredited Nurse Practitioner program, possessing current State Licensure. CPI/CPR certified is required. Qualified candidates will have a minimum of two years’ experience as Licensed Nurse Practitioner, with one year acute psychiatric experience is preferred.
